Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by New York (N) in 1965...
Traded from New York (N) to Pittsburgh on 1/31/1968 (Going to PIT: C J. Bench, LF S. Braun, P R. Klimkowski, P B. Moose, P G. Nolan. Going to NYM: LF W. Stargell, P B. Veale)...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1969, off Cecil Upshaw (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/20/1969, off Sandy Koufax (PHI)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Los Angeles on 4/11/1970...
Injured on 9/19/1970 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1975, hitting .450 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 5/5/1978 to a 1-year deal worth $760,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/1/1979 to a 2-year deal worth $2,540,000 per year...
